actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a credit or refund of manufacturers excise tax on parts and accessories installed on light duty trucks.

summary.text: Provides under the Internal Revenue Code, for a credit or refund of the manufacturers excise tax on parts and accessories installed on light-duty trucks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a credit or refund of manufacturers excise tax on parts and accessories installed on light duty trucks.
